title: Ep143: Austro-Hungary and the Eastern Front, 1916
itunes:title: Ep143: Austro-Hungary and the Eastern Front, 1916
description:
Gary and Peter are once again joined by their colleague Nicolai Eberholst to discuss the fighting on the Eastern Front in the First World War. Today, the discussion focusses on the tough battles of 1916.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free and receive special bonus content for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
